Order.create: INSERT INTO order_ VALUES (default, $1, $2) RETURNING id;
Client.add: INSERT INTO client VALUES (default, $1, $2, $3, $4) RETURNING id;
Client.update: UPDATE client SET address = $2 WHERE id = $1;
Good.hallGoods: SELECT * FROM good INNER JOIN good_hall on good.id=good_hall.good_id WHERE hall_id=$1;
Good.typeGoods: SELECT * FROM good INNER JOIN good_type ON good.type_id=good_type.id WHERE good.type_id=$1;
Good.typeHallGoods: SELECT * FROM good INNER JOIN good_type ON good.type_id=good_type.id INNER JOIN good_hall ON good.id=good_hall.good_id WHERE good.type_id=$1 AND good_hall.hall_id=$2;
